general.title: General
general.subdomainWarning: Changes to subdomain may affect organization access
general.deleteWarning1: This action cannot be undone. All organization data will be permanently deleted.
general.deleteWarning2: All chatbots, settings, and user data will be lost.

members.title: Team Members
members.invitedMembersWillReceive: Invited members will receive an email to join your workspace.

roleDescriptions.owner: Full access to all features and settings
roleDescriptions.admin: Can manage members, chatbots, and most settings
roleDescriptions.curator: Can create and manage chatbots, limited access to settings
roleDescriptions.user: Read-only access to view chatbots and analytics

removeMemberModal.title: Remove Team Member
removeMemberModal.confirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove
removeMemberModal.consequences: This member will lose access to all team chatbots, knowledge bases, and resources. They can be invited back later if needed.

transferOwnership.title: Transfer Organization Ownership
transferOwnership.description: Transfer complete ownership of this organization to another team member.
transferOwnership.warningDescription: You will be demoted to Administrator and cannot reverse this action. Only the new owner will be able to manage organization ownership.
transferOwnership.confirmDescription: You are about to transfer complete ownership of this organization to {{name}}.
transferOwnership.confirmWarning: What will happen after the transfer:
transferOwnership.consequence1: {{name}} will become the new owner with full access
transferOwnership.consequence2: You will be demoted to Administrator role
transferOwnership.consequence3: This action cannot be undone without the new owner's approval
transferOwnership.errorMessage: Error transferring ownership. Please try again.
